description: Once an order result has been displayed in web based chart system, both the time it was reviewed and the patient who reviewed it are stored in this table.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record that was reviewed.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number identifying appropriate contact for a given ORDER_ID item.

columns.name: MYC_VIEWED_BY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient viewing the record.
